title: Brandi Carlile On The Radical Vulnerability Of Joni Mitchell's 'Blue'
description: Brandi Carlile has become one of Joni Mitchell's greatest interpreters. NPR Music's Ann Powers talks with the singer-songwriter about her life with Blue, conversations with James Taylor and the gift Joni gave her.
